group_1.textLeft: Perhaps, your father was worried you would fail, and have your feelings hurt?
Wha!? ...Don't say something so embarrassing...

group_1.textRight: It's only natural for family to feel this way.
But, there is no reason to worry,
Kanoko will surely see this through.
I am sure that she wishes the factory to succeed.
"Failure is the key to success."
Even when you start with something new, and it @doesn't work out at first,
By continuing to work hard you keep stepping @forward little by little.
That is what I learned today.

group_1.textLeft: Well... maybe I did get carried away...
I know I was probably worrying over nothing...

group_1.textRight: Wait, dad, you mean!

group_1.textLeft: Why don't you make a few more prototypes?
Then we can put them into production.

group_1.textRight: Yeah!

group_1.textCenter: (Just like it said in my bible!)
(I was able to learn another lesson.)
(There are things we can understand only when @we are close to each other...)

group_1.textRight: Thank you Yuuna!
I didn't think there was any way to convince dad!

group_1.textLeft: I am just glad I was able to be helpful.

group_1.textRight: The words of her bible again...

group_1.textLeft: Hmmm...

group_1.textRight: Well, I think I have an idea...
Hotorin!

group_1.textLeft: Wha!? Hotori!

group_1.textRight: Eh! Wait! What's wrong?

group_1.textLeft: Did she fall asleep...?!

group_1.textRight: Wake up! @[wait:0.8][chara:304501:cheek_1][chara:304501:face_mtn_ex_021.exp.json:motion_200][chara:304501:lipSynch_1]You sleepyhead!

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][chara:304101:effect_shake]Ahh...
Oh... I'm sorry... I am so sleepy... @I couldn't stay awake...

group_1.textRight: That's because you stay up late everyday...

group_1.textLeft: Hotori, you look like you're really tired.

group_1.textRight: Actually... It's about the exchange meeting with @Mizuna Girls' Academy...

group_1.textLeft: The exchange meeting?... @It's in three days right?

group_1.textRight: I uh... ended up having to do everything...
What!?

group_1.textLeft: I know I should've talked to someone about it...
Haha... I'm no good...

group_1.textRight: Sorry Hotorin... I didn't notice anything...

group_1.textCenter: (She was right by my side, but I didn't notice her problems... or her condition...)
(I can't believe this is the sort of person I am becoming...)

group_1.textRight: Hey Yuuna!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:305001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wha!?[wait:1.0][chara:305001:cheek_0][chara:305001:lipSynch_1]@What is it?

group_1.textRight: "Failure is the key to success," right?
That's what you taught me.

group_1.textLeft: Ah...
......@[chara:305001:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:305001:cheek_0][chara:305001:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:305001:lipSynch_1]That's right...
(This isn't the time to be getting depressed!)
(It's time to learn from my mistakes and help@Hotori!)

group_1.textCenter: In a place like this... @I don't have time to get depressed...!
